channel.title: Getting Rid of Darkquest's combat exchanger, Help
channel.description:
I want to simply get rid of DarkQuest's combat exchanger, where it converts att, str, def, mag, rng, hits exp that a player gains into "combat experience" without giving any exp directly to that skill. How do I get rid of this and have it give experience like normal?, essentially eliminating this addon? Ive looked at previous darquest version where Peeter had not implemented it yet, but I still cannot find out where to fix it..
Any help is appreciated

item.title: Getting Rid of Darkquest's combat exchanger, Help
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

check out an earlier revision, to where there is none of that.

Read full topic
item.source: Getting Rid of Darkquest's combat exchanger, Help
